question:
Which among the following is / are parts of Nagar panchayat?
  1. Notified Area Committee
  2. Town Area Committee
  3. District Planning Committee
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Both Notified Area Committee & Town Area Committee are parts of Nagar panchayat. District Planning Committees are created as per  article 243ZD of the Constitution of India at the district level.
